channel.title: Support for Newer Particle Boards (i.e. Argon)
channel.description: Since the RedBear Duo is no longer available (Particle since bought RedBear), I wonder whether you would consider making a matching board for their newer boards, i.e. the Argon, which has BLE and WiFi functionality.

item.title: Support for Newer Particle Boards (i.e. Argon)
item.dc:creator: DrMickeyLauer
item.description:
Since the RedBear Duo is no longer available (Particle since bought RedBear), I wonder whether you would consider making a matching board for their newer boards, i.e. the Argon, which has BLE and WiFi functionality.

Read full topic
